entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.2xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #47334
  • PrivateAssets="All" breaks Android apps #47332
  • Clarify error message when trying to update dotnet tools when there are pre-release versions present #47320
  • Update pruned package data for packages that ship out of dotnet/maintenance-packages #47314
  • Update vs-solutionpersistence to 1.0.52 #47297

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 10.0.0-preview.2.25121.10, Running 'dotnet restore' failed with error MSB1025 #47089

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #47335
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • vs-solutionpersistence: 1.0.28 -> 1.0.52 #47328
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Update branding to 8.0.408 #47324
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.311 #47323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 8.0.115 #47322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • NuGetPackageDownloader: Only verify signing on windows #47321
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Unified-build lite pipeline #47317
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update branding to 9.0.203 #47326
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update branding to 9.0.105 #47325
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add variable template for signing to stage and fixup manifest paths #47318
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update builds table in VMR and SDK #47312
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete vmr-pipeline-secrets YAML #47310
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change help structure in dotnet test #47288
    Area-dotnet test
  • Refactor copilot instructions to include specific issue link for Fact… #47281
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable --interactive by default for sessions that are local. #47226
    untriaged, Document for new feature, cli-ux
  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Add spec for `dotnet run file.cs` #47020
    documentation, Area-run-file
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    Area-run-file
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure container generation uniformly reports outputs to MSBuild #47234
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [main] Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.2.25155.1 #47290
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2656628 #47010
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
